verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come and let us worship
Jesus Christ our Lord
Come and let us worship
Jesus Christ our Lord

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
For He is worthy - worthy
He is worthy
Jesus Christ our Lord

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Come and let us adore Him
Jesus Christ our Lord

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Come and five Him honor
Jesus Christ our Lord
